pullRequest.title: NF: Remove useless code
pullRequest.bodyText:
Getting an array, changing its value, and putting the array back is useless. So I remove the .put.
Similarly, creating a new array is useless, editing the old one is clearly sufficient since the objects/arrays are not shared.

commit.message:
NF: Remove useless code

Putting back the array is useless, since it has been modified.

Removing it help changing the next commits of this PR

nodes.bodyText: This changes functionality if ja has more than 2 elements.
